definition: to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
subdistrict office/neighborhood official/an official who works with local residents to report to higher government authorities
Office of the UN High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR)
pinyin: Lian2 he2 guo2 Nan2 min2 Shi4 wu4 Gao1 ji2 Zhuan1 yuan2 Ban4 shi4 chu4
containing_words.word: 联合国难民事务高级专员办事处

sentences.english: Barclaycard's Northampton office is the first to receive a CoLab space.
sentences.chinese: 巴克莱的北安办事处第一个接受了CoLab空间。

sentences.english: My transition team held videoconferences with each regional office.
sentences.chinese: 我的过渡小组与每个区域办事处举办了视频会议。

sentences.english: With the fast business expansion, we are inviting excellent candidates for positions.
sentences.chinese: 现因业务发展需要，诚邀优秀人员加盟北京办事处。

sentences.english: Creation of the Eurasia World Scout Region, serving the 12 countries of the C. I. S .
sentences.chinese: 成立欧亚地区办事处，服务独立国协的12个国家。

sentences.english: Our office is planning relocating in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 我们的办事处正在准备迁往上海。

sentences.english: Technically it's a 5-bedroom house plus an office.
sentences.chinese: 技术上，它是5家卧室加一个办事处。

sentences.english: The local office doesn't have the say about such matters.
sentences.chinese: 地方办事处对这类事没有决定权。

sentences.english: EB members readily agreed that more authority should be delegated to country offices.
sentences.chinese: 执委们爽快同意应向国家办事处进一步放权。

sentences.english: Two network engineers were transferred from the IT department to the New York office.
sentences.chinese: 两位网络工程师从IT部外调到了纽约办事处。

sentences.english: The position will report to the BSR Beijing Director and be based in the Beijing office.
sentences.chinese: 汇报上级是BSR北京总监，工作地点在北京办事处。

sentences.english: In 1789, Congress authorized the office of Postmaster-General.
sentences.chinese: 1789年的今天，国会批准邮政大臣办事处。

sentences.english: Each of the sales offices keeps a record of sales in its region.
sentences.chinese: 每个销售办事处保存本地区的销售记录。

sentences.english: Implements the straight line management by the French Laina pasture wine cellar China office.
sentences.chinese: 由法国莱纳牧场酒窖中国办事处实行直线式管理。

sentences.english: Generally speaking, I take charge of the daily administration responsibilities in the office.
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，我主要是负责办事处的日常行政管理事务。

sentences.english: The office was not crowded, and I was seen within 20 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 办事处人并不拥挤，而且我二十分钟内就得到服务。

sentences.english: Thank you for your interest in this office，Ms Dong.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你对本办事处感兴趣，董女士。

definition: subdistrict office/neighborhood official/an official who works with local residents to report to higher government authorities
to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)
to halt/to stay/to be stationed (of troops, diplomats etc)
to dispatch (sb) in an official capacity/to be posted (as an ambassador, foreign correspondent etc)
